1. Hamas' Latest Video of Israeli Hostages in Gaza Contains an Ominous Warning  Haaretz
  2. Hamas releases video of hostages in Gaza City as Israeli military advances  CNN
  3. First image in 700 days: Family of hostage Alon Ohel issues still from Hamas video  The Times of Israel
  4. Gaza City Offensive Risks Hostages' Lives With Little Chance of Military Gains  Haaretz
  5. Hamas releases video of two Israeli hostages held in Gaza  BBC
